name: Kirat Singh
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Leveraged the power of the MERN stack to build a robust and scalable e-commerce website using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Redux Toolkit. Implemented Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations using Redux Toolkit for seamless product management. Utilized responsive design to ensure compatibility across all devices and user-friendly interface using Material UI. Used Stripe for implementing a streamlined checkout process, handling payment verification. Enhanced security and user authentication by integrating Google Firebase with JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

projects.name: Fitness App
projects.description: A fitness app which helps the user to search for various exercises targetting specific categories. A CRUD application exposed using a RESTful API made with Node.js and React.js. Exposed POST, GET, PATCH and DELETE HTTP methods using Express. Used Rapid API to fetch exercises details and for youtube tutorials of the exercises.

projects.name: Next.js prompt app
projects.description: Full-stack web app using Next.js, MongoDB, and TailwindCSS. Create and customize prompts for modern AI tools. Performed CRUD operations using Next.JS. User profiles with shared prompts for community engagement.

full_output.name: Kirat Singh
interests: Learning and Exploring latest Tech Skills
